title: Powerful Features to Automate Customer Service
subtitle: AberoAI keeps conversations moving, routes to humans when needed, and gives you data to improve—all on WhatsApp.

instant.title: AI Autoreply 24/7
instant.desc: “Reply in under 60 seconds, anytime, anywhere.” AberoAI keeps conversations alive 24/7, even when your staff is offline. The result: saved bookings, happier customers, and no lost sales opportunities.

multitenant.title: Multi-tenant Management
multitenant.desc: “One dashboard, complete control of every branch.” From headquarters to small branches, every team is managed in one platform. With role-based access for each branch or staff member, your operations stay organized, secure, and ready to scale.

analytics.title: Realtime Analytics Dashboard
analytics.desc: “Decisions powered by data, not guesswork.” Track conversations, response times, and customer satisfaction in real time. These insights help you optimize ROI and uncover business trends from day one.

handoff.title: Human Handoff
handoff.desc: “Smart AI, your staff are still the heroes.” When inquiries become too complex or sensitive, AberoAI automatically routes the chat to a human agent without interruption. Smooth flow, valued customers, and efficiency maintained.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.desc: “Automatic multilingual service without limits.” AberoAI supports conversations in multiple languages, including English and Turkish. International customers feel at ease, your business looks professional, and your market reach expands effortlessly.

booking.title: Booking & After-care Automation
booking.desc: “Faster bookings, guaranteed follow-ups.” From scheduling and reminders to after-care messages, everything runs automatically. Missed appointments become a thing of the past, while customer loyalty grows stronger.
